{{< data-file-table >}}

## Adding New Files

1. Drop files into `data/` (avoid spaces; prefer `.bed`, `.gff3`, `.tsv`, `.csv`).
2. Commit & push.
3. Re-render the site locally (or via CI once configured).

Optional metadata sidecar: create `<filename>.yml` with e.g.:

```yaml
description: High-confidence gene models.
organism: Example species
source: Ensembl v110
```

Descriptions appear in the table if provided.
